title: So everybody told me about this product and I tried it
body: I've been using this for about 8 months now and it's been consistent during 8 months and my hair has grown back in and my nails are strong and long I'm surprised. My friends told me about it my hair stylist told me about it and for the longest time I put off using it. I'm not good at taking medicine or vitamins I seem to miss my schedules. But I've worked at a schedule and these became part of my daily routine and as I said I just love it

title: BIOTIN SUPPLEMENT
body: Love that this vitamin supplement is small enough to take with ease.  I have a problem with weak nails and this supplement is my ‘go to’ one for hair/skin and nails.  Believe me, I’ve tried MANY other brands but this one seems to work the best.  No more split nails.  Highly recommend.

title: Quality biotin
body: What I know is with biotin and collagen my hair has stopped falling out so much and my eyebrows are growing back. Can’t say it’s just because of the biotin but I believe it helps overall. Recommend to not order it during the summer months because the heat causes them to melt and they clump together plus it destroys any nutrients value it has. Amazon however was really good about reimbursing me when that happened.

title: Work great

The rapid release softgels are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach. I've noticed a significant improvement in the strength and growth of my hair and nails since starting this supplement. My skin also looks healthier and more radiant. Overall, I highly recommend Nature's Bounty Biotin to anyone looking to improve the health of their hair, skin, and nails.

title: Works every time for fast hair growth
body: Without fail my hair growth is bananas. At one time I’d stopped taking these to test if it was the vitamin or hair care that helped. For a while my hair growth was like at a standstill. Suddenly seemed like even half inch was difficult to get to. I also realized as I just turned a late 40ish years old, that I have a bit of hair thinning at least towards my bangs/widows peak area. Now I wouldn’t mind not having a widows peak, but I’ve always had one. Supposedly you’re either born with the gene from the fathers side of genetics, or a widows peak due to balding later in life. The bit of thinning is very likely due to medications I take such as blood pressure meds. So since I can’t stop the meds, I started biotin back up. I have tried other mixed vitamins before that has biotin, and what felt like no results. Now usually in winter my hair growth isn’t as much but I started this vitamin and also a general vitamin D. So far, just by it being obvious as I’m not measuring my hair but it’s very obvious the past few months my hair is having a growth spurt. I also know because I have to shave my legs more often again. Now this may only be me but this specific biotin I take 1x daily in the morning and with the same brand I take 1x daily vitamin D. My hair growth sped up for sure. I know it’s said that peoples hair only grows like 1/4-1/2” per month, well just guessing if my hair was growing 1/4” then it absolutely went to more. If I had to guess, if it’s possible my hair growth is more like 3/4-1” per month. Again maybe that’s not physically possible but it’s obvious him at then the highest amount of growth. I also don’t have much shedding like I had been. I have normal shedding in the shower. I’m still working also on weight loss so I’m trying some generic gummies of apple cider vinegar which is supposed to help for many things but I just started those this week. The other things I do that work for me is I forget the brand but I’m using a very popular wet/dry hair brush. I have 2 of them so one I have hooked up in my shower and one in a drawer. I use the one in the shower to gently brush conditioner through my hair. I only use conditioner mid shaft to ends. I don’t want to have my hair oily so my bangs area to midshaft I only use a tiny bit like a dime or quarter size and I don’t get any conditioner purposely on my scalp. I have to wash my hair and scalp very throughly until I see no suds at the drain. If conditioner residue is on my scalp I tend to sweat in sleep. I don’t use the same shampoo and conditioner every time and just have several in my shower, usually using Hask brand. I use all of their scents. I have a ton of different brands but I keep going back to Hask. I cannot use a conditioner that I have a hard time brushing thorough and that brand works great for me. I use usually shampoos and conditioners that have biotin and caffeine in them with collagen.

title: Get Ready for the 'Lucious Locks' Show!
body: gather 'round, because we've got a supplement story that'll have your hair tossing like a shampoo commercial! Say hello to Nature's Bounty Biotin, the little helper that brings some serious drama to your hair and nails game. Now, before we dive in, let's acknowledge the elephant in the room – the age-old vitamin conundrum. Do these pills really do what they claim? Who knows, right? But let's just say, I'm in the why not camp when it comes to gobbling up vitamins like candy. And boy, am I glad I stumbled upon this Biotin gem! The moment I started popping these easy-to-swallow pills, my hair decided to put on a show. Seriously, it was like the Broadway of hair growth! My aging tresses were now thriving, glowing, and living their best life. Move over, Rapunzel, there's a new hair queen in town! But wait, there's more! It's not just about my locks; my fingernails joined the Biotin party too. They decided to grow longer – I'll give 'em that – but hey, I wouldn't mind if they added a bit of thickness and strength. Maybe that's asking too much from these tiny pills, but a gal can dream, right? Now, let's address the price tag because we all know fabulous hair and nails don't come cheap. But fear not, my fellow beauty enthusiasts, Nature's Bounty Biotin won't break the bank! It's a budget-friendly option for maintaining that hair and nail splendor without emptying your wallet. So, here's the deal: if you want to unleash the full potential of your hair and nails, give these Biotin wonders a whirl. Who knows if it's a physical reality or just a placebo effect, but I'm strutting around with my hair and nails feeling like a million bucks. And that, my friends, is worth every single cent!

title: Unlock Your Beauty Potential with Nature's Bounty Biotin
body: I am excited to share my experience with Nature's Bounty Biotin on Amazon. This product has truly been a game-changer for enhancing the health and beauty of my hair, skin, and nails. Nature's Bounty Biotin, with its potent 10,000 mcg dosage, has played a significant role in improving the condition of my hair. Prior to using this supplement, my hair was dull and lacked vitality. However, after incorporating Nature's Bounty Biotin into my daily routine, I have noticed a remarkable transformation. My hair feels stronger, shinier, and more resilient, and I am delighted with the visible reduction in hair breakage. Not only has Nature's Bounty Biotin benefited my hair, but it has also had a positive impact on my skin. I have struggled with skin issues, including dullness and occasional breakouts. However, since taking these rapid-release softgels, my skin has become noticeably clearer and more radiant. I attribute this improvement to the nourishing effects of biotin, which supports the production of healthy skin cells. Furthermore, Nature's Bounty Biotin has played a significant role in strengthening my nails. Previously, my nails were brittle and prone to breakage, which was both frustrating and unappealing. Thanks to this supplement, my nails have become stronger and less prone to chipping, allowing them to grow longer and healthier. The rapid-release softgel form of Nature's Bounty Biotin is a convenient and easy way to incorporate this supplement into my daily routine. It ensures quick absorption, maximizing the benefits of biotin for hair, skin, and nails. In conclusion, I highly recommend Nature's Bounty Biotin to anyone looking to enhance the health and appearance of their hair, skin, and nails. With its powerful formula and proven results, this supplement is a fantastic addition to any beauty regimen. Unlock your beauty potential with Nature's Bounty Biotin and experience the transformative effects for yourself

title: One month apart photo hair update
body: I started taking these in July after I chopped my hair off just past my shoulders, one a day but if I forgot then I’d take 2 or 3 a day sometimes. Decent pill size to swallow and didn’t really taste like anything. I finished my bottle in early November and am taking other biotin pills by Spring Valley just to switch it up. My hair appears thicker and seems to be grow within those 4 months, maybe very slowly. My nails are also strong too and grow pretty fast they dont bend or break as easy. Didn’t notice any difference in my skin though. Side note: I get a trim once every 8-10 weeks because I use a lot of heat on my hair and get split dead ends, I’m in need of another soon 😅

title: Nature's Bounty took out the Titanian Dioxide so these are no longer white but that's a good thing
body: I've been taking these for several years. When I received my latest bottle I kind of freaked out. The pills are no longer white/ivory but more of a light slightly translucent honey color. I didn't even notice that it says New Color Same Great Product right on the bottle. I did a little research and Nature's Bounty has removed the titanium dioxide from these soft gels. It was used as a coloring agent that is apparently not even a legal food or supplement additive in some countries. They smell fine to me. They are not odorless but they do not smell rancid and just like before they don't have a taste or aftertaste.
